title: MobileHCI 2018
description: Web and print work for the 20th International Conference on Human-Computer Interaction with Mobile Devices and Services (MobileHCI) 2018 conference.

items.title: Base design
items.description: The main design combines the city skyline, the colors of Barcelona's sky at sunset time and the Voronoi patterns created by cell phone tower coverage.

items.title: Website
items.description: The MobileHCI 2018 website (along with Facebook and Twitter accounts) were used to communicate submission deadlines and news about the conference to the research community.

items.title: Magazine ad
items.description: Ad in the ACM Communications magazine.
